1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Rubai' bint Mu'awwidh said:"I brought a basin of water to the Prophet and he said: 'Pour it,' so I poured it and he washed his face and forearms, then he took fresh water and wiped his head, front and back, and then he washed his feet. He washed each part three times

chapter.ara-name: باب الرَّجُلِ يَسْتَعِينُ عَلَى وُضُوئِهِ فَيُصَبُّ عَلَيْهِ
chapter.eng-name: A man who asks for help with his ablution and water is poured on him
